Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       Aerotaur too was flying away from where Owlhawk had revived him, but 
he was heading in the opposite direction.  He lands calmly far outside the 
Predacon's defensive perimeter and away from the ongoing battle.  Quickly he 
returns to his robot mode and sends a brief message to Hydras.  "The Maximals 
have betrayed me.  I seek revenge."  He then sits down to await the response.

--part1_79.e45a321.2bc38975_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
